text: If you’re after a powerful-sounding speaker that doesn’t break the bank too much, then you mught want to check out the JBL Charge 6. It’s got powerful sound delivery with a deep bass sound and crisp-sounding highs, and even comes with JBL’s AI-powered Sound Boost option, which can analyze whatever you’re playing and automatically adjust the mix to reduce distortion. It’s also got impressive battery endurance with up to 24 hours of playtime on a single charge, with an added feature to squeeze four more hours for a bit more playtime.
